trans-unit.source: You configure components to set up or refine your solution.

seg-source.mrk: You configure components to set up or refine your solution.

target.mrk: You configure components to set up or refine your solution.

trans-unit.source: You don't have to get the best configuration the first time. Instead, you might start with a simple configuration and then refine it gradually as needed.

Instead, you might start with a simple configuration and then refine it gradually as needed.

Instead, you might start with a simple configuration and then refine it gradually as needed.
